.method public hidebysig virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Abstract.ISchemaBuildResult BuildSchema(class Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, class System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary`2<class System.Type, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema> cache) cil managed

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> build result if <paramref name="resolution" />
            is an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> with <see cref="P:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution.Size" /> less
            than or equal to 32; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> build
            result otherwise.
